Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.table

Class Table

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.table.Table
public class Table extends Object
The table contains all the islands, the clouds, the amount of money available, the Character card and the professors when none has gained them yet.

  • Constructor Details

    • Table

      public Table(int numPlayer, boolean expert, Method islandUpdate, Method checkProfessor, IslandStrategy islandStrategy)
      Instantiates this table and the elements it contains.
      Parameters:
      numPlayer - the number of player that joined the game.
      expert - true only if the game is played in expert mode.
      islandUpdate - the update island method TableHandler.updateIsland(Island) .
      checkProfessor - the check professor method ProfessorStrategy.checkProfessor(Game, Player, PawnColor).
      islandStrategy - the island strategy, needed to use the strategy pattern.

  • Method Details

    • fillCloud

      public void fillCloud(int numPlayer, List<Student> student)
      Adds, according to the number of players, the specified students to each cloud. The number of students present on each cloud is numPlayer+1.
      Parameters:
      numPlayer - the number of player in the game.
      student - the list of student to add containing numPlayer*(numPlayer+1) students.

      Returns the island at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      position - the index of the cloud to return.
      Returns:
      the island at the specified position.

    • withdrawCoin

      public void withdrawCoin() throws GeneralSupplyFinishedException
      Decreases the amount of money available in the general supply by one unit.
      Throws:
      GeneralSupplyFinishedException - if the number of coins to remove is zero.

    • findProfessor

      public Professor findProfessor(PawnColor color)
      Returns the professor of the color specified if present on this table. The professor is present on this table until any player has the majority of the students of the professor's color in his dining room.
      Parameters:
      color - the color of teh professor to find.
      Returns:
      the professor of the color specified, if present on this table, otherwise it returns null.

    • moveMotherNature

      public void moveMotherNature(int moves)
      Changes the position o mother nature by the specified value.
      Parameters:
      moves - the number of moves.

    • mergeIsland

      public void mergeIsland(int position)
      Checks if the island at the specified position could be merged with the previous or with the next. If there is the possibility to merge two adjacent islands, moves all the pawns and tower present on the island with the lower position between them to the other island (if the islands to merge are the first and the last, it removes the pawns and the towers from the last island), then removes the empty island from this table, updates the weight of the remaining island and eventually returns any "no entry" tile present.
      Parameters:
      position - the position of the island to check.

    • setCharacter

      public void setCharacter(int position, CharacterType type, Method islandUpdate, Method checkProfessor)
      Sets a specific character card, it's only used in test classes.
      Parameters:
      position - the position of the character in the character's list, it must be a number between 0 and 2.
      type - the type of the character to set at the specified position.
      islandUpdate - the update island method TableHandler.updateIsland(Island).
      checkProfessor - the check professor method ProfessorStrategy.checkProfessor(Game, Player, PawnColor).

    • getMerged

      public int[] getMerged()
      Returns:
      the indexes of the latest merged island (-1 if not merged)
